name: Generic
description: Default generic case template, inspired by SANS Incident Handler Handbook.

tasks.title: Initial Assessment
tasks.description:
**Objective:**
Determine if an incident has occurred and define its scope.

* Triage the alert or report.
* Collect basic information (who/what/when/where), summarize the alert.
* Assess severity, start case documentation.

**Instructions:**
* Record all findings and assessment notes in the task log (include source, time, and context).

tasks.title: Restore Operations & Monitor
tasks.description:
**Objective:**
Restore systems to normal operation and monitor for recurrence.

* Restore affected systems and services.
* Monitor for signs of reinfection or lingering issues.
* Confirm with stakeholders that normal operations have resumed.

**Instructions:**
* Track recovery actions, system status, timeline and any issues in the task log.

tasks.title: Investigate and Analyze
tasks.description:
**Objective:**
Collect and analyze all relevant evidence to determine the scope, root cause, and impact of the incident.

* Gather logs, alerts, and other data sources from affected systems.
* Analyze artifacts for indicators of compromise and attack techniques.
* Determine initial timeline and root cause of the incident.
* Assess potential business impact and affected assets.


**Instructions:**
- Record all findings, evidence reviewed, and key conclusions in the task log (include timestamps, sources, and analysis results).

tasks.title: Lessons Learned
tasks.description:
**Objective:**  
Review and improve IR processes.

* Complete incident documentation and timeline.
* Identify what went well and what needs improvement.
* Schedule and conduct a lessons learned meeting with relevant stakeholders, if needed.

**Instructions:**  
* Summarize lessons, improvement points, and follow-up actions in the task log.

tasks.title: Contain the Threat
tasks.description:
**Objective:**
Limit damage and prevent further impact.

* Blocking or disabling compromised accounts
* Isolating affected devices from the network
* Blocking malicious indicators (domains/IPs) to stop propagation

**Instructions:**
* Document each containment action in the task log (timestamp, action, result, backup evidence if done).
* If legal action is possible, consider forensic backup before making changes.

tasks.title: Stakeholder Notification
tasks.description:
**Objective:**
* Notify relevant stakeholders (users, IT, management, legal, PR as needed).
* Provide status updates as investigation and recovery proceed.

**Instructions:**
* Record who was informed, when, and by what method in the task log.

tasks.title: Eradicate the Threat
tasks.description:
**Objective:**

Remove malicious components and attacker persistence.

* Remove malware, attacker accounts, and persistence mechanisms.
* Patch vulnerabilities exploited in the incident.
* At the end of eradication, verify the environment is clean (rescan systems, check for indicators, validate no persistence remains) before starting recovery.


**Instructions:**
* Record every eradication action and verification result in the task log.
